org.mitre.openid.connect.client

Class NamedAdminAuthoritiesMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.openid.connect.client.NamedAdminAuthoritiesMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.core.authority.mapping.GrantedAuthoritiesMapper

    public class NamedAdminAuthoritiesMapper
extends Object
implements org.springframework.security.core.authority.mapping.GrantedAuthoritiesMapper
    Simple mapper that adds ROLE_USER to the authorities map for all queries, plus adds ROLE_ADMIN if the subject and issuer pair are found in the configurable "admins" set.
    Author:
    jricher
